hero.title: Luxury Rio de Janeiro Wedding Planner
hero.paragraph:
With over 20 years of experience in high-end events, Leco Biagioni is an office focused on luxury weddings.
We are based in Rio de Janeiro, the marvelous city of Brazil! Led by Leco, our team specializes in diving into each couple's dream and making it come true.
Our know-how allows us to customize every detail of your big day.
Always meeting your priorities, expectations, and desires.
We work strictly within your budget to avoid surprises with unexpected costs throughout the planning.

about.familyText: We have professionals fluent in English, Spanish, and French, which allows us to also serve couples from outside Brazil. With over a thousand events held, we have developed a strong relationship with the best suppliers in the market — enabling us to offer a personalized curation aligned with the essence of each couple.
about.philosophyText: With more than 20 years of experience in high-end events, the Leco Biagioni Office specializes in luxury weddings. Based in Rio de Janeiro — the marvelous city — we transform each couple’s dream into reality with full attention to detail. Our know-how allows us to customize every step of your big day, respecting priorities, expectations, and budget, without surprises along the way. With a solid trajectory, we are ready to conduct Catholic, Jewish, Interfaith, LGBTQIAPN+, Destination Weddings, and Dual Nationality ceremonies. We love what we do — and build real bonds with those who trust us to live this unique moment. Count on us to take care of your big day!

portfolioPage.sectionTitle: MOMENTS THAT STAY in our memories forever!
portfolioPage.sectionText:
In addition to being a wedding planner and event coordinator, Leco Biagioni also designs wedding decor — offering a complete and integrated experience for your big day. At our studio, you’ll find everything you need in one place. We bring to life rustic, tropical, modern, classic, luxurious, and themed productions, always with a refined eye and attention to detail.

Discover some of our projects and get inspired.

contactCard.headline: turns dreams into unforgettable moments!
contactCard.description: We present the best solutions to make your dream come true. Creating the perfect wedding requires time and experience in the event industry. Planning and organization are essential to make your day unforgettable. Beyond hiring vendors, organizing a wedding involves many steps.

assessoria.title: wedding planning
assessoria.description: Our planning starts from scratch, supporting the couple from the venue selection to the big day itself. In our first meeting, we hold a briefing session to understand the couple’s profile, expectations, and priorities. From there, we create an estimated investment spreadsheet and schedule venue visits. Once the venue is selected, we build a full organizational timeline. Throughout the process, we hold monthly check-in meetings in a light and enjoyable way — so the couple can enjoy each stage until the long-awaited 'I do'.

destination.title: destination wedding
destination.description: Specialists in Destination Weddings in Rio de Janeiro. We have extensive experience assisting international couples who dream of celebrating their wedding in Brazil, providing total confidence — from financial control to venue selection. We create complete experiences for couples and their guests, including airport pickup, transfers, tours, and hotel recommendations through our partnerships with renowned hotels. Our team speaks fluent English, Spanish, and French, ensuring clear communication at every stage and making your wedding in Rio an unforgettable experience.

celebridades.title: celebrities
celebridades.description: The signature behind star-studded events. With over 20 years of experience, Leco Biagioni’s office has become a reference among Brazilian artists, singers, models, and public figures. We are the choice for those seeking exclusivity, excellence, and discretion when creating unforgettable events.

cerimonial.title: ceremony
cerimonial.description: On the wedding day, every detail is carefully planned. We hold a prior meeting to define the script, timeline, and ceremony in detail to ensure everything goes as expected. Our team works in strategic areas, coordinating vendors, supervising the setup (which may take days), and accompanying the couple throughout the event. The bride and groom have their own personal assistants, and the parents are assigned 'shadows' to provide full comfort. On the big day, our team includes at least 10 assistants, ensuring flawless execution of every step.

header.title: Follow our Blog!
header.intro1: The wedding colors for 2024 are a great inspiration if you haven't decided on a color combination for your big day. They can be used as leading tones with strong presence in your decor project, or subtly blend into a broader color palette.
header.intro2: It's important to highlight that these are only suggestions for you to explore, research, and maybe include in your wedding. However, we always like to remind you that these references shouldn't box you in or make you feel like you 'have to' use them. They should only be used if they truly make sense for you as a couple. Weddings are not about rules—they're about dreams and personality.
header.peachFuzzTitle: Peach Fuzz is the color of 2025.
header.peachFuzzText: Naturally, the chosen color for 2024, Peach Fuzz, is expected to be even more prominent in wedding palettes this coming year. This soft, velvety peach tone is very versatile and perfect for events seeking a more romantic and gentle atmosphere.

pink.title: Pink
pink.text: 2023 was undoubtedly the year of pink! In addition to the major influence of the barbiecore aesthetic, the 2023 color of the year, Viva Magenta, was also responsible for the abundance of pink tones in decor and the fashion market. In 2024, we can expect pink to remain in the spotlight, especially in softer shades like Blush Pink.

blue.title: Cobalt Blue
blue.text: Blue has always been a favorite color for weddings. In 2024, the trend is for bolder, more vivid shades to stand out, such as cobalt blue and even royal blue, which promise to bring a strong presence to any decoration project.

lime.title: Lime Green
lime.text: Lime green is bold and never goes unnoticed. A perfect choice for fashion-forward brides, this neon tone is ideal for modern and maximalist weddings that aim for a vibrant and energetic atmosphere.

red.title: Red
red.text: It seems red will win over brides and grooms once again in 2024. This warm and classic color, which symbolizes passion, never really went out of style, but it has been a bit overlooked in recent years. Expect to see red not only in decor, but also in bouquets, bridal lipstick, and even nails!

lilac.title: Lilac
lilac.text: Cool and soft tones like lavender were already present in 2023, and now they are expected to grow even stronger in the new year. Special attention goes to lilac and periwinkle shades, which allow for a wide range of combinations with both light and dark tones.

yellow.title: Yellow
yellow.text: Soft yellow, mustard, vibrant yellow, and citrine yellow are just a few of the tones you can embrace if you choose yellow as one of your wedding colors. This warm and welcoming color is perfect for cheerful summer and spring weddings.
